topics.body: It has been quite dry for about a couple months in BC this year. Only today did it start raining again since like half a year ago. Everything was so yellow, the lawns. The drought was so bad that municipalities had to intact stage 3 water restricitons, which meant no lawn watering, no pools, and no car wash. Reservoir water was down 69%. And Vancouver is normally known for its super wet climate.
topics.author: 4fde5cee945b700a970060fc
